examples: Prices did not alter significantly during 2019.
Los precios no se alteraron significativamente durante 2019.
He had altered so much I scarcely recognized him.
Había cambiado tanto que apenas lo reconocí.
His actions that day altered my perception of him.
Sus acciones ese día alteraron mi percepción de él.
The landscape has been radically altered by changes in the climate.
El paisaje se ha visto radicalmente alterado por los cambios climáticos.
